item.title: Lecture 7: Plotting in Python
item.description: This lecture draws extensively from Seaborn tutorials. A primer of plotting with Python # If running in colaboratory uncomment and run the folliwing command pip install seaborn --upgrade pip install pysqldf from pandasql import sqldf pysqldf = lambda q: sqldf(q, globals()) import seaborn as sns sns.set(style="ticks") import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Why plotting? We will use Ascombe's quartet build into Seaborn to answer this questions # Load the example dataset for Anscombe's quartet df = sns.
